Package com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.db

Interface Summary
DBDataSource Interface for database DataSources, allowing query delegation on the original server
DBDataWare  
 

Class Summary
CoherentRowOrderDataWare DataWare for the DataSourceFactory.DATA_WARE_COHERENT_ROW_ORDER mode that keeps the row order during edition with the drawback of being more slow that the one that implements the DataSourceFactory.DATA_WARE_DIRECT_MODE mode

DBDataSourceAdapter Adaptador de la interfaz DBDriver a la interfaz DataSource.
